TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamespaceManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an anchor class used in managing entities, such as queues, topics, subscriptions, and rules, in your service namespace. You must provide service namespace address and access credentials in order to manage your service namespace.

example.code: NamespaceManagerSettings nsSettings = new NamespaceManagerSettings(); // with credentials and operation timeout NamespaceManager manager = new NamespaceManager(new Uri("baseUri"), nsSettings);
